thread.section_title: L'Empire Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful hotel!!
thread.title_full: Wonderful hotel!! - Review of L'Empire Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: jzaiglin
title: Wonderful hotel!!
text:
This was our first trip into Paris, and the L'Empire made it just perfect!! The staff was wonderful, Sonia was so helpful in directions to places and how to navigate the metro!!
The room was nice and big, very clean, and the bathroom was beautiful!
The L'Empire is in a great location, with easy walking access to lots of places!
The bed was extremely comfortable, and we were able to check in early after arriving on a 7:45 a.m. flight from the US.
Thanks again for a wonderful trip, and we WILL stay here again!!
